Hong Kong authorities arrest seven in $1.8 bln money laundering caseHong Kong authorities said on Friday they had arrested seven people suspected of being involved in a $1.8 billion money laundering case, the largest ever in the financial hub. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:29:33 GMT FGPYJOOL5ZJTVOYA6C5TGZP3GI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/hong-kong-authorities-arrest-7-18-bln-money-laundering-case-2024-02-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
Australian wine makers bet on expected China reopening with big shipments to Hong KongAustralian wine makers have shipped millions of bottles of wine to Hong Kong in a bet that China will soon lift tariffs on Australian wine and revive a trade worth hundreds of millions of dollars, according to industry figures and trade data. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 05:27:58 GMT WPMPLJS3LNNWPNJVH6YHVSAFHA https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/australian-winemakers-bet-expected-china-reopening-with-big-shipments-hong-kong-2024-02-16/Peter Hobson, Lewis Jackson市场亚洲市场
Nikkei charges toward all-time high, dollar under pressureJapan's Nikkei charged toward an all-time high on Friday, helped higher by a buoyant Wall Street after a big fall in U.S. retail sales revived the chance of a June rate cut, which in turn weighed on the dollar. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 02:12:51 GMT T54GJQ5O5ZPLRM35HHETX比吉https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-16/Stella Qiu市场
Dollar steady as traders weigh economic data, yen fragileThe dollar was steady on Friday, on track for its fifth straight weekly gain, as investors take stock of economic data and firm expectations of the Federal Reserve cutting rates in June, while the yen traded at the psychologically key 150 per dollar level. Fri, 16 Feb 2024 01:33:45 GMT HPH5C6ZHFVM2LH6KSAXMF7IYVQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/currencies/dollar-steady-traders-weigh-economic-data-yen-fragile-2024-02-16/Ankur Banerjee市场货币
Morning Bid: Rate hopes trump economic jittersA look at the day ahead in Asian markets. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 21:49:10 GMT VMVOEBHIZ5OLXCKKJ6UJNE64XI https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/global-markets-view-asia-graphic-pix-2024-02-15/Jamie McGeever市场亚洲市场
Anxious about US funding delay, Pacific Island nations warn about ChinaLeaders of strategic U.S.-allied Pacific Island nations have become increasingly anxious about the U.S. congressional budget impasse that has delayed approval of vital new funding packages and warned that China is actively seeking to shift their allegiances, including over Taiwan. Thu, 15 Feb 2024 20:14:04 GMT ELUYHJQIXVMG3A73B2QUVT6QBM https://www.reuters.com/world/anxious-about-us-funding-delay-pacific-island-nations-warn-about-china-2024-02-15/David Brunnstrom世界
